casebody.data:
LAWSON
v.
WHITE, et al. No. 69PA08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Gregory T. Griffin, for White, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of March 2008 by Plaintiff to Amend Petition for Certification for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
